# Introduction

This book contains all supplemental materials for the [evolution of lysogeny paper.](https://github.com/anyaevostinar/Evolution-of-Lysogeny-Paper)

## About our supplemental material 

Our supplemental materials include the following:

- R scripts 

- System configuration settings 

- Graphs not included in our paper
